TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SessionSecurityTokenHandler extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler

summary.span: 类型的 进程安全标志。

span.span: A that processes security tokens of type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类序列化、 反序列化，并验证会话令牌。The class serializes, deserializes, and validates session tokens. 会话令牌是令牌的类型。Session tokens are tokens of type . 类序列化和 cookie 格式的令牌。The class serializes the tokens to and from cookie format. 默认情况下，类将序列化令牌到 Ws-secure Conversation Feb2005 或 Ws-secure Conversation 1.3``元素。By default, the class serializes tokens into WS-Secure Conversation Feb2005 or WS-Secure Conversation 1.3 `` elements. 可使用会话令牌(WSFAM) 和(SAM) 来存储有关会话的信息这主要是与经过身份验证的用户和会话开始和过期时间。Session tokens are used by the (WSFAM) and the (SAM) to store information about a session, this is primarily the associated with the authenticated user and the session start and expiration times. 在被动的情况下，调入(SAM) 创建的会话令牌身份验证管道从表示经过身份验证的用户。In passive scenarios, the calls into the (SAM) from the authentication pipeline to create a session token from the that represents the authenticated user. SAM 使用其配置以创建令牌并将其序列化到 cookie （和进行反序列化中的后续请求的 cookie 的令牌）。The SAM uses its configured to create the token and to serialize it into a cookie (and to deserialize the token from a cookie on subsequent requests). SAM 使用其配置是实例类将写回到 HTTP 响应的 cookie。The SAM uses an instance of its configured class to write the cookie back to the HTTP Response. 此 cookie 然后返回到客户端，客户端可以在后续请求显示 cookie，而不是回要重新获取安全令牌的标识提供程序进行的往返过程。This cookie is then returned to the client and on subsequent requests the client can present the cookie rather than making a round trip back to the identity provider to re-obtain a security token. 有关会话使用 WIF 的运作方式的详细信息，请参阅[WIF 会话管理](~/docs/framework/security/wif-session-management.md)。For more information about how sessions operate with WIF, see [WIF Session Management](~/docs/framework/security/wif-session-management.md). > [!NOTE] > \ 配置元素可以用于指定，其保护应用程序的会话的责任。The \ configuration element can be used to specify a that has the responsibility for securing the application’s sessions. 开发人员应格外小心时更改此配置设置，因为配置错误的系统可能会导致应用程序被破坏。Developers should use caution when changing this configuration setting, as a misconfigured system could result in application compromise. 例如，如果指定派生的超链接"http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh193426%28v=vs.110%29.aspx"\t"_blank"和将一个空的转换 (CookieTransform) 集合传递给基，则将导致正在序列化到 cookie 未受保护的用户标识。For example, specifying a derived HYPERLINK "http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh193426%28v=vs.110%29.aspx" \t "_blank" and passing an empty Transforms (CookieTransform) collection to the base, would result in the users identity being serialized into a cookie that was not protected. 这可能允许攻击者可以修改的标识，并因此更改访问权限。This could allow an attacker to modify the identity and therefore change access privileges. 如果会话令牌是在引用模式下，即其属性是`true`、 令牌处理程序只序列化所需重新生成中的其键的属性的会话令牌的会话。If the session token is in reference mode, that is, its property is `true`, the session token handler only serializes properties of the session token that are needed to regenerate its key in the . 默认情况下，类用于表示缓存密钥，并标记处理程序将写入和的令牌属性。In the default case, the class is used to represent cache keys, and the token handler writes the and properties of the token. 如果会话令牌未处于引用模式，即属性是`false`，然后，除了前面提到的属性，该处理程序调用上序列化的令牌和存储的字节数组的方法在 cookie 以及中生成的值。If the session token is not in reference mode, that is, the property is `false`, then, in addition to the properties mentioned previously, the handler invokes the method on a byte array serialized from the token and stores the resulting value in the cookie as well. 有关如何对令牌进行序列化的详细信息，请参阅方法。For more details about how the token is serialized, see the method. 属性获取的适用于会话的转换列表令牌方法。The property gets the list of transforms that are applied to the session token in the method. 在所有转换都派生自类。All transforms derive from the class. 默认情况下和应用。In the default case the and the are applied. 使用数据保护 API (DPAPI) 来保护 cookie 材料。The uses the Data Protection API (DPAPI) to protect the cookie material. DPAPI 使用特定于在其它正在运行其保护算法中的计算机的密钥。DPAPI uses a key that is specific to the computer on which it is running in its protection algorithms. 出于此原因，默认会话令牌处理程序不适合在 Web 场方案中因为，在这种情况下，令牌编写一台计算机上可能需要在另一台计算机上读取。For this reason, the default session token handler is not usable in Web farm scenarios because, in such scenarios, tokens written on one computer may need to be read on another computer. 可以使用许多策略若要避免此问题。You can use many strategies to circumvent this issue. 例如，你可以：For example, you can: - 将默认替换与。Replace the default with the . 使您能够指定在 ASP.NET 下的签名和加密密钥``配置文件中的元素。The enables you to specify signing and encryption keys under the ASP.NET `` element in the configuration file. - 提供的处理程序global.asax.cs 文件和替换默认的会话中的事件标记处理程序的实例替换已转换的列表，其中包括和。Provide a handler for the event in the global.asax.cs file and replace the default session token handler with an instance of that has a list of transforms that includes the and the . 可以通过调用的转换列表的构造函数之一创建的新实例。You can create the new instance by invoking one of the constructors that takes a list of transforms. - 派生一个自定义转换从基本类和使用上面的方法来将其包含在转换要应用的列表。Derive a custom transform from the base class and use the method above to include it in the list of transforms to be applied. - 派生的自定义令牌处理程序从和实现你自己的机制。Derive a custom token handler from and implement your own mechanism. 有关在 Web 场方案中使用会话的详细信息，请参阅[WIF 和 Web 场](~/docs/framework/security/wif-and-web-farms.md)。For more information about using sessions in Web farm scenarios, see [WIF and Web Farms](~/docs/framework/security/wif-and-web-farms.md). 纳入的默认令牌处理程序集合; 但是，你可以将其替换的自定义会话令牌处理程序通过第一个指定[<删除>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/remove.md)元素下[ <securityTokenHandlers> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlers.md)元素从集合，然后添加你自定义令牌处理程序使用默认处理程序移除[<添加>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/add.md)元素。The is included in the default token handler collection; however, you can replace it with a custom session token handler by first specifying a [<remove>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/remove.md) element under the [<securityTokenHandlers>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlers.md) element to remove the default handler from the collection and then adding your custom token handler using the [<add>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/add.md) element. 默认情况下，你可以通过包含指定的默认令牌生存期[ <sessionTokenRequirement> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/sessiontokenrequirement.md)元素下的``元素。By default, you can specify the default token lifetime by including the [<sessionTokenRequirement>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/sessiontokenrequirement.md) element under the `` element. 你可以设计才能下的自定义配置元素的自定义令牌处理程序``通过重写元素方法以提供逻辑来处理它们。You can design a custom token handler to take custom configuration elements under the `` element by overriding the method to provide the logic to process them. ## Examples 下面的 XML 演示如何使用的实例替换标记处理程序集合中的默认会话安全令牌处理配置中的类。The following XML shows how to replace the default session security token handler in a token handler collection with an instance of the class in configuration. ```xml ```

MemberSignature.Value: protected void SetTransforms (System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.IdentityModel.CookieTransform> transforms);
.method familyhidebysig instance void SetTransforms(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.IdentityModel.CookieTransform> transforms) cil managed
Protected Sub SetTransforms (transforms As IEnumerable(Of CookieTransform))
protected: void SetTransforms(System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<System::IdentityModel::CookieTransform ^> ^ transforms);

span.span: The transforms to use.

summary.span: 设置要应用在 cookie 上的转换。

span.span: Sets the transforms that will be applied to cookies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置的转换由列表属性。Sets the list of transforms returned by the property. 转换将应用它们出现在列表中编码 cookie 时并按相反的顺序解码 cookie 时的顺序。Transforms will be applied in the order in which they appear in the list when encoding a cookie and in the reverse order when decoding a cookie. > [!WARNING] > 如果`transforms`参数是`null`，将从引发异常方法调用来进行编码或解码 cookie 时。If the `transforms` parameter is `null`, an exception will be thrown from the method when it is called to encode or decode the cookie.

span.span: Gets or sets the token lifetime.
The token lifetime.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，如果[ <sessionTokenRequirement> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/sessiontokenrequirement.md)在配置文件中，指定元素属性初始化为的值`lifetime`按属性方法。By default, if the [<sessionTokenRequirement>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/sessiontokenrequirement.md) element is specified in the configuration file, the property is initialized to the value of the `lifetime` attribute by the method.

exception.span: 发生设置小于或等于零的时间范围的尝试。

summary.span: 验证指定的会话令牌并返回其声明。

span.span: Validates the specified session token and returns its claims.
The identities that are contained in the token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 执行检查，以确保指定的标记的作用域为指定的终结点 ID 并且，如果是这样，调用方法; 否则，将引发。Performs a check to make sure that the specified token is scoped for the specified endpoint ID and, if so, invokes the method; otherwise, throws a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 会话的令牌，属性都`null`或视为空全局划分作用域。Session tokens that have an property that is `null` or empty are considered to be globally scoped. 这会带来潜在的安全风险。This presents a potential security risk. 因此你应确保属性设置在会话令牌中。For this reason you should make sure that the property is set in your session tokens.

span.span: is .
-or-
is .
is not assignable from .

exception.span: 指定令牌的 属性不为 或空并且其值不同于 参数指定的值。

span.span: The property of the specified token is not or empty and its value is different than that specified by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现将令牌序列化到 Ws-secure Conversation Feb2005 或 Ws-secure Conversation 1.3``元素。The default implementation serializes the token into either a WS-Secure Conversation Feb2005 or WS-Secure Conversation 1.3 `` element.

The token to serialize.
An instance of .

summary.span: 使用指定 XML 编写器序列化指定令牌。

span.span: Serializes the specified token by using the specified XML writer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现序列化为指定的标记的 Ws-secure Conversation Feb2005 或 Ws-secure Conversation 1.3``元素，具体取决于值属性。The default implementation serializes the specified token as either a WS-Secure Conversation Feb2005 or WS-Secure Conversation 1.3 `` element, depending on the value of the property. 属性序列化为`Id`属性。The property is serialized as the `Id` attribute. 属性序列化为``子元素。The property is serialized as the `` child element. 如果不是`null`属性序列化为``元素。If not `null` the property is serialized as an `` element. 最后，如果属性是`false`，整个令牌序列化到二进制数组传递给的方法进行编码。Finally, if the property is `false`, the entire token is serialized into binary array which is passed to the method to be encoded. 编码后的标记然后作为 base64 编码值写入到的元素和命名空间指定和属性。The encoded token is then written as a base64 encoded value to the element and namespace specified by the and properties. 如果属性是`true`，令牌不序列化。If the property is `true`, the token is not serialized.

span.span: is .
-or-
is .
is not assignable from .
-or-

exception.span: 令牌的 指定处理程序不支持的 WS 安全对话的版本。

span.span: The of the token specifies a version of WS-Secure Conversation that is not supported by the handler.
